name: Keep Up
description:
Keep Up
Embark on a journey through a world of minimalistic beauty that will test the limits of your perseverance. Keep up is a low-poly platformer that blends difficulty with serenity where every jump is a step towards mastery. Will you be the first to reach the top of the Keep ?

Key Features


  • Stunning Low-Poly World: Immerse yourself in a visually enchanting universe, explore vibrant landscapes as you navigate through a world that is as delightful to behold as it is challenging to conquer.

  • Challenging Platformer Gameplay: Brace yourself for a truly demanding platformer that will push your skills to the limit. Precision and timing are crucial as you navigate an intricate world filled with obstacles and traps. Can you conquer it and rise to the challenge?

  • Unlockable Achievements: Test your mettle and unlock a variety of achievements as you progress through the game. Whether you're a completionist or a casual player, the satisfaction of mastering this world will keep you coming back for more.

  • Community Challenge: Strive to get your score at the top of the leaderboard!
